name: Corn Medley
ingredients: 1/3 c. butter or margarine 1/2 tsp. salt
10 oz. pkg. of frozen corn 1 c. ripe tomato, cubed (1 med. tomato)
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped 1 tsp. fresh parsley
steps: In 2 quart saucepan melt butter. Stir in everything except the tomato and parsley. Cover, cook over medium
heat stirring occassionally until vegeteables are tender 10-­‐12 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in tomato
